website_summaries.verdict: A stylish white wedding choice, featuring a fancy ruffled trim and a satin bow.
pros: This comes with a touch fastener at the high-cut belly, making it easy to put on and take off
It also comes with a matching organza veil (in case it’s actually your pup who is getting married.)
cons: This style only comes in limited sizes (xx small, x small and small.)

customer_reviews.title: Adorably perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This is great! Good quality and so handsome on my pupper! The sizes run small though, so if you would assume you would need a medium, try a large! Once you get the size right it's perfect though, see for yourself in the pictures of my Brittany/Basset at my wedding (he is 30 lbs and is wearing a large)
customer_reviews.author: frecklesz91

customer_reviews.title: Poor material choice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beautiful little dress for my small dog to wear in our local dog pageant. She looked really cute, but she hadn't worn the dress for 20 minutes before I noticed the lace was ripped and coming off. Upon inspection, it seemed the lace was perhaps old and dry rotted and was just disintegrating every time it was touched. Needless to say, she hasn't been able to wear the dress again. I was very disappointed with this order.
customer_reviews.author: Reynee

customer_reviews.title: Size Runs SMALL
customer_reviews.text: The tux is well made and adorable, I would have rated 5 stars but the fact that it states "for dogs 6-14lbs" is ridiculous.My dog weighs 9lbs and it barely fit,I even measured my dog before I placed the order,and I was still disappointed at how small it actually is. The only reason it fit my dog is because he is a hairless chinese crested.It also does NOT come with a top hat. Overall the SIZES run SMALL so if you normally get a size SM for your dog I recommend getting a MEDIUM.
customer_reviews.author: aprlm/ZeusZoo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Holland Lop Rabbit
customer_reviews.text: My rabbit is 2-3lbs, Holland Lop bunny. This tux fits him perfectly. He doesn't fight to take it off and it was easy to put on. Sizing - I usually buy my bunny SMALLS from Petco and Petsmart clothes (dog clothes) they sell there. So I figured he'd be a SMALL with this. Fitting - he was fine wearing it. He walked around with it on. He wore it for a pet contest and he looked great in it! He is wearing this for my wedding :D
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sirikul

customer_reviews.title: THIS TUXEDO IS FIT FOR A KING❣️🐾🐾🐾
customer_reviews.text: Omgoodness! I'm overwhelmed with excitement! This is a well made Tuxedo. It has a Velcro front for easy put on and take off. It's well made, I love it! I ordered an XL for my 65lb American Pitbull Terrier. Yes he is a very handsome Pitbull❣️He will be wearing it on his Birthday June 8th🤗Ty AMAZON❣️UR THE BEST❣️🐾🐾🐾
customer_reviews.author: BECKY O

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run Small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this so that my baby could be a ring bearer in my wedding in May. I have a Chihuahua and he is one of the bigger sizes of chihuahua so I ordered him the small thinking that it would be plenty big enough. I could not get it closed in the front...not even close. I had to reorder him the medium. I would just caution anyone who orders this to really consider the sizes. Usually Midnight has no problem wearing a small, but not in this case. Other than that I think the tux is adorable and I'm sure that Midnight will be the best ring bearer that there ever was, looking very dapper in his tuxedo :)
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Gray

customer_reviews.title: wish i read the other comments
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the comment that says the tux runs small. I usually find that smalls are slightly big for my morkie but this was too snug for my 7 lb pup. On his back, the tux ripples like the suit on a man with very wide shoulders. If i didn't mind the hassle of shipping for exchanges, I would trade it in for a medium. The tux itself is well made and beyond adorable, love all the details. Also, make sure you know this does NOT come with a top hat despite what the description says in the features section. The seller is great, I received the tux way earlier than expected, such a nice surprise.
customer_reviews.author: Yelena Zabludovskaya

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large for my dog according to the sizing chart. He should have been between a medium and small based off of the breeds listed (he's a mix). The tux doesn't even fit him, it looks like it's meant for a small dog. I have no clue how a lab or boxer could fit in this as listed on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Aped

customer_reviews.title: So cute! Great little "Ringbearer" outfit.
customer_reviews.text: This was sooo cute and looked great on my border collie! The Large fit my border collie snugly, if he was any bigger it wouldn't have, specifically in the chest. He is a pretty standard sized purebred collie who weighs right at 45 lbs for reference. But it did fit and he was an awesome little ringbearer!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, dog did not complain
customer_reviews.text: Looked good, worked well, stayed on and in place the entire time (4 hours) dog did not seem to mind wearing it at all. Kind of hard to get on since it was a little tight and opens on the bottom, hard to get second leg through since it wraps over the top. Would be easier to get on if it opened/closed on the top, which would also allow for a leash to fit wherever. The pre-cut hole for leash was not in the spot we needed it for our harness or collar, so we had to cut another (easy). Nonetheless, we were completely satisfied with the product, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Zelinka

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is terribly wrong
customer_reviews.text: I measured our french bulldog and his measurements came out to a small/medium. I ordered a medium and the tuxedo wouldn't even close. He easily needs to go up 2 sizes and based on their size chart that is what is recommended for a German Shepard. Makes complete sense, 9 month old French Bulldog wearing the same size as a German Shepard. Our dogs neck is 16 inches and chest is 24 inches and the tux is inches from closing.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my pup in my wedding - talk of the town
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Graf

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely loved this tuxedo--We will be using it for our English ...
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this tuxedo--We will be using it for our English Bulldog who is going to be the ring bearer at our wedding. It looks extremely well made, and high quality! The size extra large fit my bulldog perfectly; as usual with Bulldog clothing it is a little big around the waist but because of the velcro it will be easy to alter.
customer_reviews.author: ToriphileSophia

customer_reviews.title: Great product and super cute
customer_reviews.text: Omg this is freaking adorable and is true to size. I measured my dog and then made my purchase , added a boutonier and had a great looking grooms dog for the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Adie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I have a 16lb Cairne Terrier and I bought him the Medium. It fit him perfectly, but if he was 18lbs it would have been too small!
customer_reviews.author: H. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: GQ Maltese
customer_reviews.text: This Tuxedo was a HIT! My Maltese who weighs about 7.5lbs wore this outfit and walked down the isle at our wedding. He was a rockstar! The tuxedo is made of great quality and easy fit. It has enough area beneath the belly to prevent any accidents. If your looking for a halloween costume or are obsessed with dressing up your puppy this is the best option out there.
customer_reviews.author: Raj D

customer_reviews.title: looks great on but doesn't run true to size I have ...
customer_reviews.text: looks great on but doesn't run true to size I have only an 8lb dog and the small is tight on him but will done for the day we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous, but UNDERSIZED!
customer_reviews.text: This is simply amazing. So elegant. The velcro closure makes it easy to put it on your dog. I'd give it a thousand fives if it wasn't for one thing: the size is all wrong. My dog is 6.5 lbs, and it didn't fit! He is a chihuahua, and the size small didn't fit him. It is weird because the description says 6-14lbs, etc. So, if I were you, I would order it for sure, but a size bigger than you intend to order it. If your dog is a small, go for a medium. Nevertheless, it is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: HonestConsumer

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews and agree with them. It is not the best made pet clothing ever, but it is also extraordinarily cheap. The sizing was a little off; I was dressing a 12 lb cat and I knew the Small would be too Small, but the Medium was too large. Still, very cute, good for a gimmick.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Stonebraker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: My best girl! She looked so pretty in my wedding photos!
customer_reviews.author: Soy

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size
customer_reviews.text: This product looks adorable but it is not true to size. It runs large so I would recommend a person to buy a size smaller than the dogs usual size. I have a Chihuahua Jack Russel and he's 16 inches long and he was lost in this costume. The material is very flimsy and it ripped along the neckline when I was taking it off of him. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Cortez

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: We got this for our german shepherd who always loves to steal the spotlight. She wore it to our wedding and upstaged me, go figure. Who wears white to someone else's wedding?!
customer_reviews.author: HB & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I have a medium sized terrier mix and she got this dress for our wedding. Looks beautiful on her and it doesn't seem to bother her so I assume it's fairly comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan L.

customer_reviews.title: Be careful, will rip
customer_reviews.text: Be careful for this, it is very delicate and will rip easily...which when putting on a moving dog, is more likely than not to happen. It looks great though, and if your purpose for this is to get it on and grab a few good pics, then it serves its purpose. Ultimately though, they need to up the quality a little bit, even at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: B. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute tux and good quality for the price. My 8lbs Pom Bentley usually wears size small but after reading other reviews saying it ran small, I ordered a medium & it fits him perfect! Bentley will look so cute in his tux at my wedding next month.
customer_reviews.author: Janae Soto

customer_reviews.title: Darling little dress for your little darling!
customer_reviews.text: This dress was just as cute as could be on my little terrier. The little veil was just precious! For "dog attire" the quality of the material was nice. It was just the perfect touch for my little girl to share my special day and I have some wonderful photographs of "us".
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice doggie formal wear
customer_reviews.text: This tux looks so cute on my 12 pound long-haired Chihuahua. He wore it to my wedding, and people couldn't get over how adorable he looked. Great deal for a decent looking doggie tux.
customer_reviews.author: NinaGibs

customer_reviews.title: Fit great, but the veil was strange how the band ...
customer_reviews.text: Dog wore this for our engagement shoot. 50 lb lab mix. Fit great, but the veil was strange how the band is very big. Nice to find a cute outfit for a dog bigger than a cat.
customer_reviews.author: CaitlinLDOKC

customer_reviews.title: The cutest thing I've ever put on my dog
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my dog to be the ring-bearer in our recent wedding. I have never seen him look cuter than he did that day. It fit perfectly. He is a maltese-poodle mix, about 10.5 lbs with thick, fluffy hair. I bought him a medium and it was perfect. It fit him perfectly. He was the best-dressed! Thanks so much for helping me complete my wedding. The tuxedo was a rousing success!
customer_reviews.author: rasta2645

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and high quality, but undersized.
customer_reviews.text: If your dog is typically a medium size, get this in large. It seems to run undersize. I bought it in two different sizes and I could not make it fit my chihuahua. HOWEVER, the material is unquestionably fine and it is very easy to put on. It closes with velcro. I have yet to find the perfect fit, but if your dog fits the dimensions, get it! It is gorgeous and definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: HonestConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Nice pet party outfit
customer_reviews.text: This size fits perfectly for our 6lb 1yr old Biewer Terrier. He looked great in it and everyone wanted to take a picture with him at my sister's wedding! The outfit was easy to don. Before ordering this item, make sure to measure your pet's dimensions accordingly to avoid making the mistake of overestimating or understimating your pet's body size.
customer_reviews.author: Agean2010

customer_reviews.title: If you have a lot of daughters and have a string of weddings...
customer_reviews.text: Great...good quality and looks like the photo. Buy it a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Robert W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute as can be but runs very small! Order carefully!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my daughters wedding. Adorable but ran way small. Says good 6-14 lbs. Our Shih Tzu is only 6.5 lbs and it did not fit. Could velcro around but very tight. Will have to return and have ordered a medium. Use caution when ordering by size. This small looked like it would fit a teacup Yorkie! Otherwise have to give it an excellent rating as it is perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.author: FlygirlDeb

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Here in Tampa we have "Dogtoberfest" so I got this adorable outfit for my little girl and a tuxedo for my boy. They were quite the HIT at the festival looking all dapper in their silk outfits. My little girl pranced around like she knew she was in a dress it was so darn cute!! Great quality product and a great conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: KCee The Animal LoverTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: STAR OF TH SHOW WONT WEAR HIS TUX
customer_reviews.text: IT'S CUTE,AND IT FITS MY HAVANEESE ,CHARLEY. I BOUGHT HIM A MEDIUM. I BOUGHT IT FOR HIM TO PERFORM HIS TRICKS IN.BUT,HE MUST FEEL TOO CONSTRICTED WEARING IT. ALTHOUGH WE ARE STILL TRYING TO GET HIM TO WEAR IT DURING SHOW TIME
customer_reviews.author: vicki Blagg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: A little bit silly, but I purchased this as a joke to put on a komodo dragon stuffed animal. It was well made and looked really nice. Also fit perfectly. As others stated though, I imagine your dog would need to be really small for it to fit him or her. But for a tiny dog or a stuffed animal, you can't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: aezyske

customer_reviews.title: Got it for my crested for special occasions
customer_reviews.text: My crested is a service dog, so i bring him everywhere. I also plan on him being the ring bearer at my wedding! He looks so good in it, but id get a size larger if your dog has hair. My dog is bald, so he didnt need that extra room. It fit his 14.5 chest perfectly. He looks like such a stud!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Very Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Great description. We have a 10lb chihuahua and we purchased a small. Fits adorably.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Cutest tuxedo ever!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend's dog and he was very comfortable with sweaters and coats. My friends and I were going to a club formal and we could bring him, so I bought him a tuxedo so he would be as well dressed as the rest of us. He looked so dapper. Really glad I bought this for him. Easy to put on and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Korra Khym

customer_reviews.title: Good for a few hours of wear
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted. It's a wedding dress for a dog at a totally reasonable price. Good for a few hours of wear, and it'll make for some cute photos. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!
customer_reviews.text: Adorable!!!! Small size fit my 10-lb cat perfectly. Super adorable. Quality is bad but then again, I'm guessing people are purchasing this outfit for 1 occasion really. So quality isn't a problem. Totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Staizha

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: one wash and it was done :( but looked very cute :)
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Davis

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT MEET SIZE REQUIREMENTS
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of the tux. But it should be labeled 1 size under and they should make a size bigger. Especially for all the dogs out there with larger chests. I am having my Mother take it apart and inserting pieces so it will fit him from should to should and not pull so hard. My Boxer is slim and trim and the largest size did not fit. We will make it work some how. It would be great for small dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Dog lover

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit, but okay for a novelty
customer_reviews.text: The fit ran small on both the medium and large on a 22 lb pug. He is tall, but still a Large shouldn't be tight given the deacription. It will work for the 30 minutes of our wedding ceremony, but long term, it's seems uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: Tuxes are awesome, pretty true to size, and look great on my pups. The quality is so-so and kind of cheap. Noticed some holes in the sitching and went through both tuxes on my own time with a needle and thread so my pups didn't tear it further.
customer_reviews.author: Christen

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a mini poodle mix weighing about 15 lbs and I bought this for him. It fit perfectly! Easy to put on since it's velcro in the front and he didn't try to remove it so I assume it's comfortable. Super cute! Looks amazing! Would def recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Viv

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too big for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10lbs shih tzu mix - medium it was too big and had to get it altered. He wore it for my wedding pictorial. He was adorable. A size small would've fit him better. I've attached a pic - that's after I got the item altered.
customer_reviews.author: Keeks

customer_reviews.title: Use for your own pattern, not as the actual dress.
customer_reviews.text: Super cheap, crappy satin. Ended up using it as panels by buying real fabric. My sister is super talented and ended up making it real cute. Worked great as a base, I guess. My dog was an adorable flower girl at our wedding!!!
customer_reviews.author: SweetCherryFly

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality for a small price
customer_reviews.text: Fast Shipping!. Nice quality for a small price. It's adorable! I bought this one and it was too small so I hurried to buy a medium. I may return it or keep it, not sure. I bought the bride too. So cute! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Small sizing.
customer_reviews.text: Mainly for very small pups. XL is really small. My dog is a beagle yet it didn’t fit him.
customer_reviews.author: Eedoo

customer_reviews.title: A little big, but still cute
customer_reviews.text: My dog is right on the line between the medium and small measurements, so I got a medium; but wish that I had gotten a small. I'll have to do some sewing to take it in for her so that it fits, but it's still a really cute dress. There isn't much of a selections for "wedding dresses for dogs" on here, and this was really the only option that wasn't too pricey. So for the money, it's not bad. The fabric is a little cheap looking- too shiny for my taste. But it'll work, and the veil is super cute. She's wearing it down the aisle as a "flower girl" at my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Christine F

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dachshund, got it in medium because he is so long. The sleeves where a bit big but he looked soo cute in it anyways!
customer_reviews.author: anonimous

customer_reviews.title: Not well made
customer_reviews.text: The tuxedo is not well made, as there are several loose threads. The fabric seems a little stiff and like it won't hold up with time. My Kals looked very handsome in it, though.
customer_reviews.author: KalsMum

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: The outfit is super cute and I'm very excited to see others reactions when my dog wears this at my wedding. One thing I do want to say though is that these run very small. I have a Dachshund mix who is 16 pounds and a Medium just barely fits him. It's still a bit snug around the shoulder blade area but will do for a few hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: spebb23

customer_reviews.title: Sized a Bit Small
customer_reviews.text: My male pug weighs 17 pounds. We bought him the size medium and we're glad that we did. The small would not have fit him. Had some difficulty getting this outfit on our pug. But once it was on, he was very handsome. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sahrle

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but beware before you size up
customer_reviews.text: It's great quality and looks adorable, but in taking everyone's advice about it running small, I ordered a large for my 21 lb Lhasa Apso mix and it's way too big. So take note before you go up a size....you may not need to.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Sizes aren't accurate. I had to order an extra large for a 35 pound dog! Large says it's for a Labrador & it was too tight for a smaller dog!
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Adorable but poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: The veil tore almost instantly out of the box, but I was still able to snap a few pictures of my cat dressed as a bride. I might have tried to return if I planned to use it again, but hopefully I only get married once and the cat only has to deal with my cheesy photo shoots once as we'll!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Widmyer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely adorable
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for our 6-7 lb yorkie poo to wear for our upcoming wedding. There is so much detail and it looks absolutely adorable on him. Size small fits him perfectly. He's a tiny little guy, so if you had a dog that's larger, a small probably won't work.
customer_reviews.author: relbeis

customer_reviews.title: Suit Up!
customer_reviews.text: my dogs were my ring bearers at my wedding and they were just the cutest dogs ever! Instead of taking pictures with the bride and groom, my guests were taking pictures with my dogs...A MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.author: Vikki

customer_reviews.title: It's a good purchase for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's made with cheap material and threads were coming out from the satin. I still used it for my wedding because my dog wore it only during the ceremony. Overall. It's a good purchase for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Dibble

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend a Medium if your pup is any bigger
customer_reviews.text: The little Yorky is about 8 pounds the Small was a bit tight but worked. I'd recommend a Medium if your pup is any bigger. His chest measures about 16" around. So Cute!
customer_reviews.author: Serious Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Marco the star Therapy Dog.
customer_reviews.text: We gave it 5 stars, because it (finally) was the perfect thing for our IG to wear. We were taking him to a country club awards dinner so we decided to dress him up. He is used to coats and clothes so everything went well. It did take us two trys to get the correct size, because the sizes were not represented correctly. What was listed as fitting a much bigger dog fit him perfect. I wish you could see the picture of him at the dinner table.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Perry

customer_reviews.title: Fit well but could have probably ordered an xs for better fit. It really is a one time use ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit really well. Ordered small for my 4.5lb maltese. Fit well but could have probably ordered an xs for better fit. It really is a one time use since the velcro used to close it sticks to the white shirt and pulls strings on it. That was disappointing wished it had something other then velcro to close it. That was the only reason I gave it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: quality was what you'd expect so it was fine. I have a labrador retriever mix and got ...
customer_reviews.text: quality was what you'd expect so it was fine. I have a labrador retriever mix and got the XL. measurements said it would fit but it was way too small. so if you have a big dog don't order
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ring bearer outfit
customer_reviews.text: We are having our puppy be the ring bearer in our wedding, so he needed a tux! The fabric is well made and sturdy, but it arrived already torn! I was able to fix it easily, but if you cant sew, make sure to check it over! For the price it shouldn't come torn.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Atwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Item was as advertised problem was our French Bulldog has a very large chest. Had to reorder in LARGE! Dog only weighs 23 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: DonWhitbeck

customer_reviews.title: We're going on a trip...
customer_reviews.text: SO, since our little one is allowed on some premises we thought it only cute to dress him up! It might run a little small though-- do measure him before you buy--but it was a great little item!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Janet C. Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Frenchie
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my French Bulldog to wear at our wedding. Our Golden is going to be the ring bearer, so we had to dress our girl up too. She is a 20-22 lbs Frenchie and the dress was perfect for her size. Also, it came with a cute veil that she actually does not mind wearing (shocker!).
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Payne

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but fell apart immediately
customer_reviews.text: My dog wore this for an engagement photo shoot for about 30 minutes. By the end, several of the seams had problems and the bow fell off. It worked fine for what we needed it for, but the quality was pretty amazingly bad.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Karlin

customer_reviews.title: Hats off!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and I love the split tail and the detail of the buttons up the front. The only criticism I have is the bow tie was not attached properly and I had to stitch it back on again but otherwise a great product!
customer_reviews.author: MelLaw

customer_reviews.title: Fits and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tuxedo for my 7lb Maltese/poodle. Even though my dog was hyper that day it was easy to put on. It Velcros in the front all the way down and he didn't seem to mind it at all. I took a star away because it's hard to see the bow tie unless he is looking up. I wish the bow tie was changeable. He is going to be a ring bearer in my mom's wedding and I would have liked to have an aqua bow tie to match the other ring bearer (my nephew). I may bejewel the black one with aqua stones. Overall a great product, looks just like a baby would in a tuxedo!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Item, but it was way too small.
customer_reviews.text: The doggie tuxedo was great quality, but a "small" was waaaay to small for my 12 lb Sheltie. I shoulda ordered a Medium. I couldn't use the item at all. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainMike

customer_reviews.title: Totally cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Yorkies to wear in my wedding. They were so cute. Size chart is true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Pepsi Caligone

customer_reviews.title: Bichon Wedding Beauty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this dress for our pooch parade and it fit perfectly and the headdress was super cute. Can't wait to see if we win with this costume. I also bought a small for my Bichon/poodle mix and she still had wiggle room. She is 5lbs also.
customer_reviews.author: Tricey

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have a 8 lb Minskin cat and the small fit him as if were tailored for him!!! He looked ADORABLE and didnt mind wearing it at all. The tux is NOT cheaply made at all. It looks AMAZING on!
customer_reviews.author: KMG

customer_reviews.title: it was perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog wore this on our wedding day, it was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: JBM

customer_reviews.title: Adorably cute, and fits my 12 lb miniature pinscher ...
customer_reviews.text: Adorably cute, and fits my 12 lb miniature pinscher very well...maybe a little loose but better than being too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: and great quality. Just size up
customer_reviews.text: WAY too small for my 15 pound Jack Russell. Very cute, and great quality. Just size up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Dog Tuxedo (That's Something I Never Thought I'd Say)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tuxedo for my springer spaniel. It did rip very easily, but that could have been due to my excitement of seeing said springer spaniel in his new tux. (He grew out of his old one.)
customer_reviews.author: K. Pastore

customer_reviews.title: A little pricy for one wear.
customer_reviews.text: We got lots of complements but it's a one time wear only, as soon as we took it off the velcro got stuck on the wannabe silk shirt & it pulled all the stitching.
customer_reviews.author: Kdiddle

customer_reviews.title: but it will be just fine for my pup to wear down the aisle with ...
customer_reviews.text: I think this dress is a little pricey for the quality, but it will be just fine for my pup to wear down the aisle with me. :) Shipping was excellent, as always.
customer_reviews.author: dragonmermaid

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: So happy with quality and fit. My Scottish fold looked so handsome! One of the best costumes for halloween
customer_reviews.author: TechGeek

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loved this outfit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tux for the family dog for our son's wedding. He is a 9 lb Yorkie and the small fit him snuggly. The outfit was perfect for the wedding day and our dog was comfortable and enjoyed wearing it, although he does not usually wear clothing in the house. He took beautiful photos with the groomsmen and earned the title of "The Second Best Man"
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy

customer_reviews.title: Too big for our 6lb pet
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice outfit but it was too big on our 6lb Biewer Terrier. We had to get Small size for him. Make sure to measure your pet's body size before you order to avoid making the mistake we made.
customer_reviews.author: Agean2010

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE
customer_reviews.text: Had purchased this for my dog for our wedding. Everybody gave us compliments on his outfit. Fit just right! so adorable. Alot more cheaper then in stores. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: gabriela

customer_reviews.title: The most adorable outfit ever for your fur baby to wear
customer_reviews.text: The most adorable outfit ever for your fur baby to wear !!!! I recently purchased this tuxedo for my Jack Russell for my upcoming wedding day April 30th.. As always shipping was quick and it fit him to a tee and he looks so handsome for my wedding day pictures .. Great quality and great price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase and the quality was great too and for the price I couldn't have found a better outfit for my Shih Tzu Haley .. She looks adorable in it ... It was the best purchase I've made for my baby ...
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: This was a really cute and well made tuxedo for my english bulldog. Unfortunatley, I got a medium thinking that would work as he was only 4 months old and I went by the measurements, but with his broad shoulders I had to go with the large - which was a little to big but at least it closed when it was on him. I would suggest this to anyone that is planning on having their dog as a part of their special day. The price was good and it was delivered faster than it was estimated to be.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Really cute :)
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for my friend's dog for her wedding photos. I measured his body, his neck is 16" around, and largest part of chest is 24" around. I ordered an XL just to be safe, it was a little big but we just pinned it back and it worked fine:) (see my photo). He only needed to wear it for a short amount of time, but the tux looked like good quality and he looked handsome so it served its purpose :)
customer_reviews.author: VELOCIRAPTOR

customer_reviews.title: Super cute tux for my boston terrier
customer_reviews.text: I ordered size medium, but actually it is a bit tight. It fits but I kinda wish I ordered one size larger. My boston wore it for a wedding and he was super adorable!
customer_reviews.author: uglydance

customer_reviews.title: Great tuxx!
customer_reviews.text: Great pet tuxedo for the price. Make sure you take measurements,the Medium size fit my chihuahua (14lbs) just perfect! It does fit a little wide by the legs, but its fine. Your dog has to have the room to walk in it. Other than that, great material not cheap looking. Definitely was the head liner at my wedding!
customer_reviews.author: sweetcheeks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME! 7lb Chihuahua. 11yrs. Bought a small. Velcro. Adjust veil... very easy. I love this!
customer_reviews.author: cpooh

customer_reviews.title: No Veil
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for granddaughters planned wedding for her pooch. Paid extra for speedy delivery. Arrived on time, however, bag that dress was in was ripped open and there was no veil. Can't return as the dress was needed immediately. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Karyl Wile

customer_reviews.title: What a hit
customer_reviews.text: Ok, so we are one of those people who had our dog in our wedding as the ring bearer. Neither one of us thought we were one of those people, but a week before the wedding we saw this dress and thought maybe. Then the dress arrived and we tried it on our 15lb Jack Russel Cindy Lou. It fit perfectly and she looked amazing. That was it.... she was in the wedding and what a hit she was! Excellent quality. As pretty as it looks in the picture. Did a fantastic job. Built perfectly for a dog to wear without getting tangled up or tripping. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Moonlightbiker

customer_reviews.title: Not for corgis
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it, my corgi could not fit it correctly with his short legs.
customer_reviews.author: itscmr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dress for a dog at a bridal shower!
customer_reviews.text: This dress is absolutley adorable on my shih tzu -- she wore it at my bridal shower and was a hit. She weights about 14 pounds and the medium size was great for her.
customer_reviews.author: hollywood2009

customer_reviews.title: So Precious!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved it!!!!!! I have a Shih Tzu and a medium fit perfectly the veil was a little big but I am just gonna clip it to her collar so now biggy. Whats nice about it is that it still allows them to use the bathroom and won't get in the way. I am so pleased with this outfit and I can't wait to see her on my wedding day!
customer_reviews.author: NewMRS.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, So cute for our dog for the wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: looks great on our baby! using for our wedding. we are pleased. (a little slim fit).
customer_reviews.author: t-rex

product_meta.title: East Side Collection "Yappily Ever After" Groom's Tuxedo for Dogs, 8" XXS
product_meta.description: Size:XX-Small| Style:Wedding DressNo one can upstage the bride on her wedding day, but your dog can be a clear number two in terms of grabbing the attention with the East Side Collection Dog Wedding Dress. The wedding dress costume for dogs works great on a wedding day, during Halloween parties or at other times when a costume is appropriate. The dog white wedding dress includes a ruffled trim, a skirt with an organza overlay and a large satin bow, along with a headpiece that fits with a chinstrap. The XX-Small size of pet wedding dress is made for dog breeds like toy poodles and Chihuahuas and measures 8 inches in length. Five other sizes of wedding dresses are also available.
feature_bullets: Fun Wedding Pet Costume – The East Side Collection wedding dress for dogs is fun for a wedding or other time where pet costumes are appropriate
Detailed Dog Dress Costume – The white wedding dress for dogs includes a ruffled trim, a skirt with an organza overlay and a large satin bow
Coordinating Headpiece – The dress collection also includes a white headpiece with an organza veil and a satin bow, held in place with a chinstrap
Yappily Ever After – The dog will fit right in at the wedding with this great looking dress, creating a wedding memory no one will forget
XX-Small Size – This XX-Small Size dog wedding dress measures 8 inches in length and is made for dog breeds like toy poodles
